caption.p: ( a) The anticancer activities of RA in HL-60, MT4, Hela, HepG2, SK-OV-3and MCF-7 cell lines; ( b) DNA Topo I inhibitory activity of RA using Camptothecin (0.1 mM) as a positive control; ( c) Representative photographs of zebrafish SIVs. The SIVs of zebrafish embryos are indicated by a white rectangle; ( d) Effects of the representative compounds and control on SIVs’ length of 72 hpf zebrafish embryos (x ± s, n = 12), * p < 0.05; ( e) DPPH radical scavenging activity; ( f) ABTS radical scavenging activity.
